channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- Intel Microprocessors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- Intel Microprocessors

item.title: CVE-2022-29901|2024-08-03T06:33:43.000Z -- intel -- intel%20microprocessors
item.description: Intel microprocessor generations 6 to 8 are affected by a new Spectre variant that is able to bypass their retpoline mitigation in the kernel to leak arbitrary data. An attacker with unprivileged user access can hijack return instructions to achieve arbitrary speculative code execution under certain microarchitecture-dependent conditions.
